title: Digital Technology-Enhanced Language Education Leadership Development Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital device proficiency and language education experience
context.additional_context: A course for educational administrators/leaders to enhance their capacity for designing digital technology-integrated language education. Project-based assessments yield practical, applicable outcomes.

learning_goals: Learners design three or more student-centered language learning activities using digital tools.
Learners operate peer assessment and feedback processes using LMS-based collaboration tools.
Learners develop digital content plans by applying the Technology Pedagogical Content Knowledge (TPCK) integration framework.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
